entry.title: Spider Lilies on the Farm・田畑のヒガンバナ

link.title: Spider Lilies on the Farm・田畑のヒガンバナ

entry.content:
Many farms in the Kitasaga area have red spider lilies and cosmos blooming all around. The rice and other crops have just been harvested but the flowers remain.

北嵯峨地区の田畑のあちらこちらに、ヒガンバナやコスモスが咲いています。米などはもう収穫されましたが、花はまだ残っています。
entry.summary: Many farms in the Kitasaga area have red spider lilies and cosmos blooming all around. The rice and other crops have just been harvested but the flowers remain.

entry.title: Moon Crossing Bridge・渡月橋
entry.content:
The harvest moon rises over Arashiyama’s Togetsu-kyo, or Moon Crossing Bridge. It’s the day for the tradition of “Tsukimi”, or moon viewing.

嵐山の渡月橋に中秋の名月が昇る。この日は、月見にいい日、とされています。
entry.summary: The harvest moon rises over Arashiyama’s Togetsu-kyo, or Moon Crossing Bridge. It’s the day for the tradition of “Tsukimi”, or moon viewing.

entry.title: Osaka Skyline・大阪のスカイライン

link.title: Osaka Skyline・大阪のスカイライン

entry.content:
Two more photos from the top of the Umeda Sky Building:

Top, looking northeast at the Yodo River and Yodogawa-ku area of Osaka behind. Osaka is a “city of water”, and there are many, many bridges that cross the numerous rivers and canals. Way in the distance, Kyoto’s Katsura and Kamo Rivers merge into the Yodo River, which empties into the Osaka Bay off to the left (see yesterday’s photo).

Bottom, looking south at the highrises just west of Osaka Station.

梅田スカイビルの上から二つの写真：

上、淀川と淀川区が北東に見えています。 大阪は「水の都」であり、色々な川や運河を渡る橋がたくさんあります。 遠くの方で、京都の桂川と鴨川が淀川に合流し、淀川は左側の大阪湾に流れ込んでいます（昨日の写真を参照）。

下、大阪駅の西の高層ビルを南に見たところ。
entry.summary: Two more photos from the top of the Umeda Sky Building: Top, looking northeast at the Yodo River and Yodogawa-ku area of Osaka behind. Osaka is a “city of water”, and there are many, many bridges that cross the numerous rivers and canals. Way in the distance, Kyoto’s Katsura and Kamo Rivers merge into the Yodo River, which empties into the Osaka Bay off to the left (see yesterday’s photo). Bottom, looking south at the highrises just west of Osaka Station.

entry.title: Dusk Over the Yodo River・淀川の夕暮れ

link.title: Dusk Over the Yodo River・淀川の夕暮れ

entry.content:
Looking west towards Kobe, from Osaka’s Umeda Sky building. In the distance, center, you can see the Akashi-Kaikyo Bridge, the subject of a few weeks ago.

大阪の梅田スカイビルから西に神戸に向かって。 遠くの中央には、数週間前の被写体である明石海峡大橋が見えます。
entry.summary: Looking west towards Kobe, from Osaka’s Umeda Sky building. In the distance, center, you can see the Akashi-Kaikyo Bridge, the subject of a few weeks ago.
